BG3 Charge-Bound Warhammer Information

Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and attack rolls. Shocking Bound: This weapon deals an additional 1~6 Lightning damage. This hammer's magical powers only function if it's Bound to an Eldritch Knight or is a Warlock's Pact Weapon. Range: 1.5
